# LimitScope enumeration

If TRUE, the maxCount is a "per world" limit, if FALSE, it's a "per level". Possible values: `PerLayer`, `PerLevel`, `PerWorld`

```csharp
public enum LimitScope
```

## Values

| name | value | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| PerLayer | `0` |  |
| PerLevel | `1` |  |
| PerWorld | `2` |  |
